short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Night Fury and Light Fury soar through the night sky, embodying a perfect balance of darkness and light.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings a sense of harmony between darkness and light. The sleek, black Night Fury contrasts beautifully with the glowing, elegant Light Fury, creating a visually captivating experience every time you open a new tab.
